cleaned_text: Price 9 in stock 80 pellets If you're dealing with generalized pain or discomfort, try Boiron Arnica Montana 30C oral pellets for fast-acting relief! - Promotes general relief from occasional aches* - Supports a natural response to inflammation* - Helps reduce pain caused by exercise and overuse* - Promotes a healthy healing process* Boiron Arnica Montana 30C If a large portion of your body is in pain, you're in need of a product that will target it all — try Boiron Arnica Montana 30C for relief to generalized discomfort! The active ingredient, arnica montana, is a powerful herb that has been utilized for hundreds of years for its many restorative properties. Boiron Arnica Montana 30C contains a highly potent form to benefit the body in a variety of ways, including: - Promoting relief from muscle and joint aches caused by overuse* - Supporting the body's response to inflammation* - Helping alleviate occasional pain and stiffness* - Encouraging a healthy wound-healing process* - Helping repair bruised skin* While the arnica montana plant is known for its ache-alleviating properties, its level of dilution can alter how it affects your body. Homeopathic medicine has a specific way of measuring potency. A product with a potency level of 30C has been diluted more than a product with 6C — but the product with 30C affects the body in a more generalized way, whereas, the product with 6C targets a localized area of the body. Because Boiron Arnica Montana 30C has a higher level of potency, this product best supports your body's response to generalized discomfort. All you have to do is place the tablets under your tongue to dissolve before you start feeling that sweet sense of relief! If you're dealing with localized pain, such as an achy joint or a small bruise, try [Boiron Arnica Montana 6C](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product/boiron-arnica-montana-6c/)! These oral pellets have a stronger concentration of arnica montana that will help you avoid that discomfort. Suggested Use Adults and children age 2 and older: At the onset of symptoms, dissolve 5 pellets under the tongue 3 times a day until relieved, or as directed by a doctor. Cautions: Keep out of reach of children. Ask a doctor before use in children under 2 years of age. Stop using this product and consult a doctor if symptoms persist for more than 3 days or worsen, if new symptoms occur, or if redness or swelling is present, because these could be signs of a serious illness. If pregnant or breast-feeding, ask a health professional before use. Questions? We've got answers!
